Privacy Policy

Introduction

At Opacity Browser, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of information when you use our application.

Information Collection and Use

We do not collect any personal information from our users. We respect your privacy and ensure that no personal data is gathered, stored, or shared by our application.

Log Data

While using our application, no log data is collected from your device. We do not track your activities or gather any information that could be used to identify you.

Cookies

Our application does not use cookies or similar tracking technologies to collect or store any information.

Third-Party Services

Opacity Browser does not share any user information with third-party services since no personal information is collected in the first place.

Security

We value your trust in using our application and strive to ensure that your experience is safe and secure. Since we do not collect any personal information, there is no risk of unauthorized access to your data.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted.
